article: thousands of police and railway workers combed the french railway network in a fruitless search of bombs thursday , as intelligence agents sought to identify the unknown group that is threatening to set off a series of explosions unless the government pays millions of dollars .
abstract: france 's rail tracks combed for bombs as police hunt blackmail group
